description:
Mao is a Gundam plastic model builder from Kyoto. He has been taught how to create Gundam plastic models since he was young. He appears to be spacey due to his appearance and Kansai dialect, but he in fact has a hot fighting spirit in his heart. He is a good rival of http://anidb.net/ch57667 [Sei]`s.
Source: ANN
name: Yasaka Mao
